name: Sacrifice To Magma God (Art in progress)
name_original: Sacrifice To Magma God (Art in progress)
description:
CONTROLS: 

CHANGE CITIZEN STAMENT - If you clicking about citizen, you can change his actual stament, always nobody is sacrifying in this moment.

Magma God is angry and threat with destroy your village if you don't bring him human sacrifices. You must manage the different staments; villager, soldier and politician.  Each one be satisfies the god hungry more or less, but be carefull. If a determinated stament reduce or grow too much, you lost.

For example, if you have few militaries, other rivals tribes can destroy your home. If you have too much militaries, they can supplant the politican class.

IMPORTANT!: The art is in progress. Some sprites are temporal.

CREDITS:

Miguel Lima Gómez - Programmer / Game Designer

Elena Hevilla Moyano - Artist

EXTERNAL ASSETS:
